name: wp-team-list
title: WP Team List
description: Create a simple team site using your WordPress users. The plugin provides you with a shortcode, template tag and a widget.

scripts.uglifyjs: find assets/js -type f -name '*.js' ! -name '*.min.js' -maxdepth 1 | while read FILE ; do uglifyjs "${FILE}" -o "${FILE%.js}.min.js" ; done
scripts.build:css: postcss assets/css/src/style.css -o assets/css/style.css && npm run rtlcss
scripts.build:js: babel assets/js/src -d assets/js && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch assets/css/src --watch assets/js/src -e css,js -x 'npm run build'
